Title: Fire Sprinkler Permit
Description: Required for the installation or modification of fire sprinkler systems to ensure compliance with safety standards.

Title: Fire Alarm Permit
Description: Needed for installing, altering, or repairing fire alarm systems to maintain fire safety and code compliance.

Title: Commercial Hood Permit
Description: Required for installation or maintenance of commercial kitchen fire suppression systems to prevent grease fires.

Title: Fire Alarm Communicator
Description: Permit for replacement or installation of fire alarm communicators that transmit signals to emergency responders.

Title: Day Care Inspections
Description: Inspection requirements to ensure daycare facilities comply with fire safety regulations.

Title: Firework Stand Permits
Description: For temporary firework stands.

Title: Pyrotechnics Permit
Description: Authorization for the use of aerial or special pyrotechnics in public displays or events.

Title: Food Truck Permit
Description: Permit required for operating mobile food vending units, ensuring compliance with fire and health codes.

Title: Food Truck Permit Spanish - Permiso de camión de comida en español
Description: Permit required for operating mobile food vending units, ensuring compliance with fire and health codes.

Title: Temporary Structure Permit
Description: For temporary tents greater than 400sq/ft and canopies greater than 700sq/ft placed for 180 days or less.

Title: Special Burn and Bonfire Permit
Description: For open burning and recreational fires not located in an enclosed 2'x3' fire pit.

Title: Hydrant Flow Request
Description: Application to test and document water flow from fire hydrants for fire protection planning.

Title: Residential Access Water Supply
Description: For new and residential additions that involve living space

Title: Smoke Alarm Program
Description: Program and permit details related to smoke alarm installation and maintenance requirements.

Title: Hazardous Material Removal
Description: Guidelines and permits for safe removal and disposal of hazardous materials.

Title: Fuel Storage Tank Permit
Description: For storage of flammable and combustable liquids in containers and tanks.

Title: Developer Information
Description: Information packet and permit requirements for developers regarding fire safety and building codes.

Title: Fire Watch
Description: Permit for assigning personnel to monitor fire safety during system outages or high-risk activities.

Title: Fire Extinquisher Inspections
Description: Schedule and requirements for regular inspection and maintenance of fire extinguishers.

Title: Knox Box
Description: Permit and guidelines for installing Knox Boxes to provide emergency access to secured buildings.

Title: Emergency Radio Coverage Permit
Description: Permit to install or modify radio coverage systems that enhance emergency responder communication.

Title: Battery Systems permit
Description: For the installation of a stationary battery system regulated by Section 1206 of the 2018 IFC.

Title: Compressed Gases Permit
Description: For storage, use, or handling of compressed gasses in excess of the amounts listed in Table 105.6.8 of 2018 IFC.

Title: Exhibits and Trade Show Permits
Description: Associated with assembly of the public for events indoor and outdoor.

Title: Explosives Permit
Description: For manufacturing, storage, handling, sale, or use of any quantity of explosives or explosive material.

Title: Fire Operational Permit
Description: Any operational permit listed in the 2018 IFC that does not have its own application.

Title: High Piled Combustible Storage Permit
Description: Use of a building or portion thereof with more than 500 square feet, includign aisles, of high piled storage.

Title: Liquified Petroleum Gas Permit
Description: For storage and use of LP gas.

Title: Places of Assembly Permit
Description: For all assembly occupancies.

Title: Refrigeration Equiment Permit
Description: For operation of a mechanical refrigeration unit or system regulated by Chapter 6 of the 2018 IFC.
